org.gbif.occurrencestore.persistence.api

Interface OccurrencePersistenceService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.gbif.api.service.occurrence.OccurrenceService, OccurrenceWriter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OccurrencePersistenceServiceImpl

    public interface OccurrencePersistenceService
extends org.gbif.api.service.occurrence.OccurrenceService, OccurrenceWriter
    A convenience interface to avoid exposing writing and other, expensive methods at the public api level.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Iterator<Integer> getKeysByColumn(byte[] columnValue, FieldName columnName)
      Returns an iterator over the occurrence keys that match the given column name and value.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gbif.api.service.occurrence.OccurrenceService

    • Method Detail

      • getKeysByColumn

        Iterator<Integer> getKeysByColumn(byte[] columnValue,
                                FieldName columnName)
        Returns an iterator over the occurrence keys that match the given column name and value. Note that this Iterator will probably be backed by a connection to a datasource (e.g. HBase) and there is the possibility that the connection will fail and/or timeout. If that should happen a runtime ServiceUnavailableException will be thrown. To guarantee that any held resources are properly released, make sure to iterate until getNext() returns false.
        Parameters:
        columnValue - the value to match
        columnName - the column to check for the columnValue
        Returns:
        an Iterator over the occurrence keys matching the requested column
        Throws:
        org.gbif.api.exception.ServiceUnavailableException - if the underlying data connection fails
